song.title: Create in Me a Clean Heart
song.lyrics:
[C] .G D C G Create in me a clean Heart, Oh God . D C G And renew a right Spirit within me
[v] .C D G Em Cast me not away from Thy Presence, Oh Lord . C D G G7 And take not Thy Holy Spirit from me . C D G Em C Restore unto me the joy of Thy salvation .C D C G And renew a right Spirit within me
song.presentation: C C V C V C
